content: featured as skacel collection increase s august 2017 crochet-along-together cat this pattern will be released over four weeks august 3nd- week 1 august 10th - week 2 august 17th - week 3 august 24 - week 4 updates will be published at 12pm est have you ever been intimidated to join as you go there s no fear here in this cat you will learn how to join motifs as you go for a seamless finish this bright and fun wrap has a lacy ripple body that is also connected as you go it s a thrill to watch the colors change and the various stitches keeps things interesting pick up your supplies and join us august 3rd this design features * 1 2 balls of schoppel-wolle zauberball® stärke 6 shown in color 1505 kunterbunt * written instructions charts and video tutorials which will be released during the cat skills you will learn include * working in the round * magic_ring * picot stitch * as-you-go joining technique * treble_crochet * ripple stitch pattern finished dimensions height 7 5 length 71 25 scarf height 13 5 length 71 25 stole feel free to stop over and introduce yourself in the skacel group 1 where the cat will be hosted be sure to add this project to your library to receive updates as they go live please note the hook size for this project is 3 75mm us sizes vary from brand to brand just like sizes of pants from store to store while addi® calls a 4mm a us f other companies may call it something else as there is no us convention for sizing when in doubt always refer to the millimeter size 1 http //www ravelry com/discuss/skacel-collection-increase/3643860/1-25
